name: Wizised
description:
Hello we are team IG104, this is our first gamejam. 

We implented the theme "Resizing matters" by giving the player a spell wich he can use to enlarge/shrink matter. Different sizes enable you to do different things.

Apart from our own made assets, we used these free online ones:
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/environment-library-26c53ed3f9a84256a45607917c63c321
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/mouse-2943470a34b049a78e05898a920c1dd2
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/cheese-wedge-5167e6bba94a4c09b4d780f625bceeda
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/clock-3aab20b9e6364bbd8730c8af6ebf3587
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/detail-scroll-2ea9dac5040e46f0841ee407296282b6
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/wizard-6f3cac680da64d57a93ac302d735770e
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/wooden-bucket-68d83e2d634940f594df30998aba652c
https://free3d.com/3d-model/crocus-flower-v1--75899.html
https://resources.blogscopia.com/2010/04/22/flowerpot/
